original: NOBDSTBÖM, Johan Harald, Disponent, Borås, f östra Sönnarslöv, Krstds l, 15/5 11 av kont.ch S N o Elvira Nordin, gm Eva Billig. Studex Krstd 29, KTH 29—33. Techni-kum f Textilindustrie i Reutlingen 36—37. Anst v AB Sv:s Fören Trikåfabriker i Borås sed. 33, nu disp där. Resor: Tyskl 36—37.
translated: NOBDSTBÖM, Johan Harald, Manager, Borås, born in östra Sönnarslöv, Kristianstads län, on May 15th, 1911, to father's name Sven Nordin and mother's name Elvira Nordin, married to Eva Billig. Completed secondary education in Kristianstad in 1929, studied at KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) from 1929 to 1933. Attended Technikum for Textile Industry in Reutlingen from 1936 to 1937. Employed by AB Swedish Association of Knitwear Factories in Borås since 1933, currently working as a manager there. Traveled to Germany in 1936-1937.

worksFor.name: AB Swedish Association of Knitwear Factories

career.workplace: AB Swedish Association of Knitwear Factories
